page.title: 14MINERS STRIKE
page.content: Hundreds of people were affected by the miners strike. One night before I went to bed I checked the coal in the coal shed. In the morning I checked it again and noticed half of it was gone and I found a picket's badge on the floor. I told my mum and she said that we would have to get a bolt on the door so that no more coal would go. During the strike the children of the striking miners were getting toys and clothes from miners in other countries like Sweden. They also got tickets to see films. My dad said it wasn't fair and that they should buy their own tickets.
